title: Ticket #7056: Scheduler Universe job restarts indefinitely if missing input
description:
When debugging some unit tests, I forgot to provide the correct input file to this scheduler universe job: 

universe   = scheduler
executable = job_core_io.pl
output = job_core_input_sched.out
error = job_core_input_sched.err
log = job_core_input_sched.log
input      = job_core_input.in
Notification = NEVER
queue

(I.e., job_core_input.in doesn't exist on my local filesystem). Subsequently, every SCHEDULER_INTERVAL, this occurs: 

05/16/19 15:50:57 -------- Begin starting jobs --------
05/16/19 15:50:57 Found idle scheduler universe job 1.0
05/16/19 15:50:57 Job prep for 1.0 will not block, calling aboutToSpawnJobHandler() directly
05/16/19 15:50:57 aboutToSpawnJobHandler() completed for job 1.0
05/16/19 15:50:57 Starting sched universe job 1.0
05/16/19 15:50:57 Open of job_core_input.in failed, errno 2
05/16/19 15:50:57 -------- Done starting jobs --------

I would have expected the job to go on hold after this occurs!
